The photos were published on March 6: 2021, in a Facebook post that was shared more than 10,000 times.
The Burmese: language caption of the photos stated, "Uncovering the corpse of Ma Kyal Sin. 5-3-2021 (night)."
Kyal Sin: also known as "Angel," was one of 38 anti-coup protesters killed in Myanmar on March 3, 2021, and her death gained international attention.
State media MRTV claimed that Kyal Sin: s grave was exhumed with the permission of the family for examination, and an investigation into material found on her body concluded that she was not killed by the police.
